title: in order to operate on a web site i use i need to add the website to compatibility in explorye 11 i don't know how to do this in edge
body: I need compatibility in edge I can't operate correctly if I can't add the site to compatibility list like I can in explorer 11

comments.body: This is why Windows 10 ships with Internet Explorer. This way you can still use legacy web applications in IE Enterprise Mode while you are updating those applications to modern web standards. Edge will not contain compatibility modes nor will it have a facility to run pages that use deprecated standards.
